info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 18 at 10:51PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Phillips, west central Garfield and west central Valley Counties through 1115 PM MDT... At 1050 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 15 miles northeast of Zortman to near Devils Creek Rec Area. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Malta, Devils Creek Rec Area, Phillips, Wagner, Content, Sun Prairie and Bowdoin. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
